StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateProgramCriteriaWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramID AS INT, @E.ec.veDate AS DATETIME, @WaiverID AS INT, @AddCriteria AS CHAR(1), @UserLogin AS VARCHAR(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER PCW WHERE PCW.PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramID AND PCW.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE = @E.ec.veDate AND PCW.WAIVER_ID = @WaiverID) BEGIN ------------------------ -- If the record does not exist and the user is trying to add a record, -- then perform the insert. ------------------------ IF @AddCriteria = 'Y' BEGIN INSERT INTO PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER (PROGRAM_ID, PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE, WAIVER_ID, USER_LOGIN) VALUES (@ProgramID, @E.ec.veDate, @WaiverID, @UserLogin) END END ELSE BEGIN ------------------------ -- If the record does exist and the user is not trying to add a record, -- then perform the delete. ------------------------ IF @AddCriteria = 'N' BEGIN DELETE FROM PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER WHERE PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramID AND PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE = @E.ec.veDate AND WAIVER_ID = @WaiverID END END
------------------------ -- Otherwise, there is nothing to be done. ------------------------
SET NOCOUNT OFF
